advanced_search_text: Finding different type of information on a crowded event is a primary functionality. Whereas trying to find the needed company by a specific category or a speaker on the event.
advanced_search_quicksearch_title: Quick search with tons of functionality.
advanced_search_quicksearch_text: Sometimes you need to search something quickly for a specific category or a person, our platform allows to achieve that by simply entering a line of text in the top spotlight search.
advanced_search_quicksearch_text_tab1: View stands right from the quick menu!
advanced_search_quicksearch_text_tab2: Schedule meetings without leaving quick search.
advanced_search_quicksearch_text_tab3: Start chat with notable people on the event!
advanced_search_find_anything_title: Find anything that interests you on the event!
advanced_search_find_anything_text: Apart from a spotlight search the attendee can search for data in an advanced mode by filtering the search results for a specific types of data. At the moment one can search for:
advanced_search_people_search_text: Find and instantly chat with or arrange meeting with notable people that attend an event or stand.
advanced_search_stand_search_text: Easy access to stands and brands that may interest you. Find out who is present on each stand!
advanced_search_tage_search_text: Just looking for something specific that interests you on a certain event? Tag seach is your best friend!
